meaningMnemonic: The <radical>slide</radical> coming out of the patient's <radical>heart</radical> is there because a mad scientist is testing to see if it's a good way to drain the body of blood. The patient is alive now... but they are definitely slated for <kanji>certain</kanji> death.
readingMnemonic: As the beeping heart thing starts to do one long continuous beeeeeeeeeeeeeep, the doctor puts his hands together and <reading>hits</reading> (ひつ) the dead patient over and over, attempting to bring him back.
